title: West of Pinto Basin. Part I
creator_credit: Peak Films, George Weeks and Roy Luby
brief_description: Part one of a two-part story. The Range Busters solve the mystery of a series of stage-coach robberies. Pleasant, light western. Suitable for children. Cast includes John King, Ray Corrigan. Silent film with English captions.
creator_credit_for_label: Peak Films, George Weeks and Roy Luby
